name: Goth Kid
description:
A platformer game where you play as Goth Kid and collect coins to open the exits while trying to avoid the light along the way. 

  • Controls
    • M - Mute music
    • Arrows (or WASD) - Movement and crouching
    • UP to exit level 
    •  Spacebar - Jump
    • ESCAPE - Open pause menu
  • Easy Mode
    • "Try Again" = restart level
    • Health regenerates between levels
    • No score increase on level completion
  • Hard Mode
    • "Try Again" = start at Level 1-1
    • Health persists through each level
    • Significant score increase on level completion

Please let me know if you find any bugs or have any issues!

* Disclaimer *

The scoreboard is currently only saved locally so you will only see the scores you have received (plus my score which is included by default).
